import axios from'axios';var api=axios.create({baseURL:'http://localhost:3000/api'});export var insertMember=function insertMember(payload){return api.post("/member",payload);};export var getAllMembers=function getAllMembers(){return api.get("/members");};export var updateMemberById=function updateMemberById(id,payload){return api.put("/member/".concat(id),payload);};export var deleteMemberById=function deleteMemberById(id){return api.delete("/member/".concat(id));};export var getMemberById=function getMemberById(id){return api.get("/member/".concat(id));};export var getMembersByOrg=function getMembersByOrg(id){return api.get("/member/getMembersByOrg/".concat(id));};export var getMembersByMemberType=function getMembersByMemberType(id){return api.get("/member/getMembersByMemberType/".concat(id));};export var updateAge=function updateAge(id){return api.get("/member/updateAge");};// add button to update members' age manually
export var getAllOrganizations=function getAllOrganizations(){return api.get("/organizations");};export var getAllMembershipTypes=function getAllMembershipTypes(){return api.get("/membershiptypes");};var apis={insertMember:insertMember,getAllMembers:getAllMembers,updateMemberById:updateMemberById,deleteMemberById:deleteMemberById,getMemberById:getMemberById,getAllOrganizations:getAllOrganizations,getMembersByOrg:getMembersByOrg,getAllMembershipTypes:getAllMembershipTypes,getMembersByMemberType:getMembersByMemberType,updateAge:updateAge};export default apis;
